file-changes.explanation:
To fix the issue of invisible checkboxes in the file tree, we've added a custom style sheet to the FileTreeView class. The changes are as follows:
1. In the `__init__` method, we've added a `setStyleSheet` call with a custom CSS-like style. 2. The style sheet defines the appearance of the checkboxes (indicators) in the QTreeView. 3. We've set a specific size for the checkboxes (13x13 pixels). 4. For unchecked boxes, we've set a white background with a dark border to ensure visibility. 5. For checked boxes, we've used a blue background (#0078D7) to make them stand out.
These changes should make the checkboxes clearly visible against both light and dark backgrounds, solving the issue of dark borders on dark backgrounds.
